tables.table_schema:
CREATE TABLE backups_and_disaster_recovery (
  backup_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  backup_name VARCHAR(255) NOT NULL,
  backup_timestamp TIMESTAMP NOT NULL,
  backup_location VARCHAR(255) NOT NULL
)

CREATE TABLE BackupStrategies (
  id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  strategy_name VARCHAR(50),
  backup_frequency VARCHAR(20),
  retention_policy VARCHAR(50)
)

CREATE TABLE DisasterRecovery (
  id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  recovery_plan_name VARCHAR(50),
  failover_procedures TEXT,
  data_replication_strategy VARCHAR(50)
)

CREATE TABLE BackupRuns (
  id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  backup_strategy_id INT,
  timestamp TIMESTAMP,
  success BOOLEAN,
  FOREIGN KEY (backup_strategy_id) REFERENCES BackupStrategies(id)
)

CREATE TABLE RecoveryRuns (
  id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  recovery_plan_id INT,
  timestamp TIMESTAMP,
  success BOOLEAN,
  FOREIGN KEY (recovery_plan_id) REFERENCES DisasterRecovery(id)
)

CREATE TABLE BackupLogs (
  id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  backup_run_id INT,
  logs TEXT,
  FOREIGN KEY (backup_run_id) REFERENCES BackupRuns(id)
)
